hotels.title: Five-Star Macau Waterfront Stay with Swimming Pool Overlooking South China Sea
hotels.description: Pure style and sophistication are the focus of the five-star Mandarin Oriental Macau, which boasts an unbeatable location on the prestigious Macau waterfront. Incredible facilities ensure a memorable stay, including four world-class restaurants and bars, an artisan cake shop, a swimming pool overlooking the South China Sea, and a harbourfront fitness centre. For a dose of relaxation, the onsite spa offers a range of treatments designed to pamper you from top to toe.
